pull.title: build: remove double LIBBITCOIN_SERVER linking
pull.body: Seems that this is no longer required. Have tested building on macOS and Debian.

### Conflicts

* [#16367](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16367.html) (Multiprocess build support by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
